PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Using the COLOR field, this keyword is colored pink instead of the normal keyword color.
Increases attack damage of this card. NL Whenever unblocked damage is dealt, transfer one less #yLV to the target and set this card's XP to one less the target's #yXP.
Your next Attack will gain equivalent #yXP. NL Enemies deal equivalent extra damage.
#yKR-inflected creatures take damage whenever you lose HP or Temp HP. NL #yKR cannot kill on its own.
A power that triggers an effect after a certain number of cards have been played.
Triggers an effect after a certain number of cards have been played.
A unique effect that occurs when a #yCountdown reaches 0.

Only if a card is normally ${modID}:Unplayable, play it anyway at the cost of 1 HP. NL If a card is #ypersevered, add an #yTrapped copy of the card to your hand. If the card is always Unplayable, exhaust it instead.
This card can always be #yPersevered.
Cards are #yCritical if in the middle of your hand or #yPersevered. Some cards have a bonus effect when #yCritical.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP from Attacks.
Receive 66% more damage from non-Attacks.
Until end of combat, prevents damage to HP.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 ${modID}:LV.
Any buffs can only be stolen if enemy didn't start with them or they are non-permanent. NL Strength and enemy #yLV is converted into player #yLV. NL The card will glow if anything can be copied.
#yXP which cannot be lost.
#yXP which is transferred upon dealing unblocked attack damage.
#yTrapped cards are Unplayable. NL They cause you to lose 1 energy when drawn. #yTrapped cards cause you to lose 7 HP when #yPersevered.
#yMonochrome cards have Ethereal and Exhaust. NL They will give you one energy when played.
Any card containing "Strike" in their name.
A basic Defend card.
Any [E] used not playing cards. NL (Such as Void, or unspent lost energy at the end of turn)
Escape from a non-boss combat after 12 cards have been played. NL Receive no rewards.
If this enemy is attacked, they will instead gain #yBetrayed.
This enemy gains twice as much #yLV when attacked.
This card deals non-attack damage, is unaffected by Block modifiers, and isn't treated as a card played.
Total enemy attack damage is greater or equal to your current HP.
Effect triggers when you obtain this card.
Attacks will deal 1 less damage for their #yLV or #yXP this turn.
Vitality improves Temp HP gained from ALL sources.
Your next Attack will end in 9 NL (You will gain #yLV until it does).
Makes a #yTrapped card untrapped.
#yKR deals damage as if you had lost HP or Temp HP.

Any buffs can only be stolen if enemy didn't start with them or they are non-permanent. NL Strength and enemy #yLV is converted into player #yLV. NL Enemy HP is converted into Temp HP. NL The card will glow if anything can be stolen.
Choose an effect to obtain from a selection of choices. NL Choose a remaining effect for the enemy.
A positive effect.
A negative effect.
Whenever the target gains Block, it takes 1 damage. NL Didn't you know NEO is famous for its high defense?
Both you and the enemy must have the same Buff or Debuff.
Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP or Temp HP.
Add a card to your hand with related lesser effects. NL (Will either have half the number displayed, cards restricted to 0 or 1 cost or only have a chance of being played)
Gain 19 gold the first time played. NL Gain 19 gold the second time played. NL Gain 97 gold the third time played.
Soulbound to the enemy attacked. NL Dies whenever the target dies.
Deals 3 damage to a random enemy on its turn. NL Whenever the dummy takes damage, so does its #ySoulbound target.
Gives you 2 block on its turn. NL Whenever the dummy gains a power or gains Block, so does its #ySoulbound target.
When a #ynon-${modID}:Trapped card fails to play, #yPersevere it and reduce by 1. NL Removed on turn end.
Unplayable cards or cards that lack the conditions to be played, such as having insufficient Energy.
This turn, target takes 1 more attack damage.
The enemy's intent will be the one it was last turn. The enemy's powers will be reverted to the amount they were at at the end of the last turn, if they were greater.
Negates the next debuff.
Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
Dexterity improves Block gained from cards.
Gain ${modID}:LV whenever you play a card.
Strength adds additional damage to attacks.
Take 9 damage after playing four cards.
Gain 8 Block after playing four cards.
